GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1866 as New Hampshire College of Agriculture and Mechanic Arts. Acquired present title charter 1923. The largest institution of the University System of New Hampshire. Integrated the Granite State College (IAU-006767) 2023, which became its College of Professional Studies as well as the so far affiliated-only University of New Hampshire School of Law (IAU-020332) - now the Franklin Pierce School of Law - the same year
